If enabled, links for edit, delete, statistics, etc, will be displayed under the ad.

Choose what to do when your custom HTML/JavaScript ads are blocked by AdBlock. The last two options use the following phrases: siropu_ads_manager_support_us_message and siropu_ads_manager_support_us_title
This option allows you to enable AdBlock detection based on user's device.
This option allows you to display the notice after x page views.
This option allows you to display the notice every x minutes.
This option allows you exclude certain pages from AdBlock detection by specifying the page content template.
Allows you to exclude certain user groups from AdBlock detection.
This option allows you to display a custom message to users who have AdBlock enabled. You may use HTML.
If an URL is provided, the user will get redirected to this URL when AdBlock is detected. This option only works with "Force user to disable AdBlock".
A list of custom ad sizes that you can use when creating packages.
This option allows you to parse keyword and affiliate link ads when you post.
This controls the maximum number of ads that will be shown in ad list.
If you are using ads.txt file, you can edit it from here.
This option allows you to display a message to your users regarding the affiliate links on posts. You may use HTML to style the message.
This option allows you to enable affiliate link ads in thread custom fields.
This option allows you to archive ads that haven't been active in the last x days. Archived ads will have the status "Archived" and won't be visible in the ACP by default.

Some Ad Blockers may block the siropu/aml path to the data directory on your server, preventing banners from displaying. To fix that problem, you can use this option to change the path from siropu/aml to something unique (avoid ad related names such as "banners", "ads", etc).

Once you have provided a unique name and hit the save button, the directory will be created automatically and current banners copied from the old directory to the new directory.
This option allows you to set a time frame between click counts for the same ad by the same visitor.
This option allows you to automatically delete click fraud monitor entries that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
This option allows you to hide from blocked IPs all the ads that use click fraud monitor.
This option allows you to automatically delete ad click statistics that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
This option allows you to automatically delete ad daily statistics that are older than x days. Set to 0 to disable it.
This option allows you to automatically disable ads with a low CTR (Click-Through Rate) after x days. This option only affects ads created from the admin control panel.
You may want to prevent all ads from showing within certain templates, such as errors or other pages that may be against your ad provider's ToS. List them above.
If you want to prevent all ads from showing on certain pages, you can specify the page URLs here.

Some Ad Blockers may block the siropu/aml/core.min.js file found in the js directory on your server, preventing some features such as statistics from working. To fix that problem, you can use this option to change the directory path from siropu/aml/core.min.js to something unique (avoid ad related names such as "banners", "ads", etc).

If you are not using an external path (CDN), the format should be: directoryName/fileName.js

Once you have provided a unique path and hit the save button, the directory will be created automatically and current JS file copied from the old directory to the new directory.
This option allows you to enable keyword ads in thread custom fields.
This option allows you to globally hide ads in certain nodes, by adding each ID separated by comma.
If enabled, this will display the controller class, controller action, view class and the content template name of any page (to use in page criteria).
If enabled, you can view where each position is displayed. This doesn't include dynamic positions and some predefined positions.
This option allows you to globally hide ads in certain threads, by adding each ID separated by comma.
This option allows you to globally hide ads in certain threads based on the prefix.
Keyword and affiliate link ads will not apply to posts made by users in the selected user groups.
This option allows you to set a time frame between view counts for the same ad by the same visitor.
Select the method that will be used to count views.

Jos tämä vaihtoehto on käytössä, sivukartta rakennetaan automaattisesti uudelleen määräajoin. Jos tämä vaihtoehto on poistettu käytöstä, sivukartta päivitetään vasta, kun se rakennetaan uudelleen manuaalisesti Työkalut ja välimuistien uudelleenrakentaminen . Nykyiseen sivukarttaan pääsee sitemap.php -sivulla.

Once a sitemap is built, if this option is enabled, the updated version will be automatically submitted to search engines. If this option is not enabled, search engines will only know about the sitemap if it is listed in robots.txt or if you manually submit it to them.
If you wish to exclude certain content types from the sitemap, that can be done here. Note that content must be guest accessible to be included in the sitemap, regardless of this setting.

If desired, you may include additional URLs that would not otherwise be included in the sitemap. Place each URL on separate lines. Note that these URLs must match your board URL or they will not be included. Partial URLs will be converted to absolute URLs automatically.
Nämä ovat oletusasetukset, jotka tarkistetaan, kun roskapostin puhdistajaa käytetään. Henkilöllä, joka todella käyttää roskapostinpuhdistajaa, on mahdollisuus muuttaa näitä vaihtoehtoja.

Tämä hallitsee sitä, mitä tapahtuu roskapostittajien lähettämille viesteille, kun roskapostin puhdistaja otetaan käyttöön heitä vastaan. Huomaa, että jos sisältö ei tue poistoa näkymästä, se poistetaan pysyvästi tästä asetuksesta riippumatta.

Kun jokin näistä lauseista on kirjoitettu viestiin, seuraava toimi toteutetaan. Kirjoita yksi lause riville. Voit käyttää * -merkkiä jokerikorttina minkä tahansa sanan vastaavuuteen. Jos aloitat rivin / -näppäimellä, riviä käsitellään säännöllisellä lausekkeella (esimerkki: /testi/i).
Tämä hallitsee sitä, mitä tapahtuu roskapostittajien aloittamille keskusteluille, kun roskapostin puhdistusainetta käytetään heitä vastaan.
Roskapostin puhdistaja on käytettävissä vain käyttäjiä vastaan, jotka täyttävät nämä kriteerit. Jos jokin näistä kriteereistä on asetettu arvoon 0 (nolla), niitä ei huomioida.
Sidebar position for the XenForo Staff Online Now block.
Sidebar position for the Statistics add-on.
A Steam Web API Key is required for this plugin to function. Terms of the API are here.

Displays an alternative login bar for Steam that mimics other XenForo login bars. Not recommended by Valve because their official images represent the Steam brand to users. Overrides Steam Login Button option if enabled.
Will use the registering user's Steam avatar as their forum avatar. Disabling will give user the default forum avatar.
Display game banners for people in-game if supported. Can cause an extra API request per user in game.
Display an informational/status block in the message content portion (top right).
Display an informational/status block on messages user information.
Display an informational/status block in profile.
Exclude display of Steam statistics for appids in this list. Comma delimited. Example: 440,550,4000 would exclude stats from Team Fortress 2, Left 4 Dead 2, and Garry's Mod.
Polls the Steam Web API for game statistics on users. Disabling will reduce API requests.
While enabled, when Steam User Polling cron runs it'll forcefully update image links for games from the Steam API. Recommended to leave disabled unless you need to update image links.
Polls the Steam Web API for game statistics on a user during registration. Disabling will reduce API requests, however, stats won't exist for the user until the cron runs.
Controls the source of the images from the Steam CDN. Not all CDN options support HTTPS/SSL. Steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net (HTTPS/HTTP) is recommended, unless you have issues with protocol relative links.
Only display Steam statistics from appids in this list. Comma delimited. Example: 440,550,4000 would only show stats from Team Fortress 2, Left 4 Dead 2, and Garry's Mod.

Controls the source of the API call. If you want to grab JSON over HTTPS instead of HTTP, change to HTTPS only if cURL is enabled and supports HTTPS OR openssl for PHP is installed if cURL is not enabled.
Controls the style of login button on the vistors panel.
Display a navigaton tab for public Steam statistics.
Displays the login bar underneath the "Sign up now!" button.
Ota käyttöön StopForumSpam-integraatio uusien rekisteröitymisten ja viestien tarkistamiseksi.
Allows individual alert/push & auto-read/mark-as-read behaviour defaults to be configured
Allows grouping of alerts by alert date.

Allows grouping of alerts by content type or user to reduce clutter when a user receives a high numbers of alerts.

Time in seconds between successive calls to alert re-summarize
0 to disable the flood-check

XFES supports * for wildcard any search, if this is enabled MySQL search will support * and rewrite searches with a empty keywords into a * search

SVG images are a complex format, and non-validated SVGs can allow arbitrary javascript to be loaded in the site's context. This add-on does attempt to sanitize any attached SVGs

This applies to existing attachments. To stop SVG's being upload remove the 'svg' extension from the Allowed attachment file extensions option.

Estä käyttäjien mainintojen renderöinti, jos katselijalla ei ole oikeutta nähdä mainittua sisältöä.
Allows you to change the default order for search results. This affects quick searches and the default value selected on the advanced search form.

If enabled, a tag cloud showing the most popular tags will be shown on the tag search page.
Tags will not be shown in the tag cloud unless they have been used at least this many times.

This controls the minimum and maximum length of tags. Use 0 to disable a limit. Tags may never be longer than 100 characters. These limits only apply when a tag is created. Existing tags may always be used.
Määritä tunnisteiden (tagien) sallittu muoto ja tarkistukset.

Ability to match and replace thread content using PHP preg_replace function(http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-replace.php). E.g. "'pattern', 'replacement'" . You can define more than one replace rule on each line.

Perusviesti - Älä sisällytä viestin sisältöä ja kuvien esikatselua Push-ilmoituksiin
Rikas viesti - Sisältää viestin sisällön ja kuvien esikatselun Push-ilmoituksiin
By filling a usergroup ID, you can assign new users registered from Tapatalk to a specific secondary usergroup.
The number of days to maintain template edit history records. Use 0 to never remove history.
The Unix time stamp of the last terms and rules update.
Expand donation bar's progress on page loads
Users listed here will receive an alert each time a new donation is made.
Your ThemeHouse API key. You can find your API key here.
If this option is enabled, all styles will be installed through FTP instead of attempting to copy the files on the server using PHP. Use this if you get permission errors while installing a style.
If you're using any additional styles and want your default avatars consistent across styles you'll want to enable this option to enable Material avatars regardless of style
This will define the octal file permissions to use for new directories. The default value of "0755" should work in most situations. This option is only used if you install with FTP
By default, the postbit will be collapsed for all users. Use this option to set it as collapsed by default for registered or unregistered users, or both.
This is the default currency that will be selected when you create a new campaign
By default, the sidebar will not be collapsed for any users. Use this option to set it as collapsed by default for registered or unregistered users, or both.
How long (in seconds) should the sidebar collapse for before being reopened? Leave at 0 for indefinite.
By default, the side navigation will not be collapsed for any users. Use this option to set it as collapsed by default for registered or unregistered users, or both.

Enabled services will be able to associate existing accounts upon login. Important: enable this only for services that you trust to have verified the user before login, otherwise account hijacking may be possible.
If disabled, users will not be able to access their accounts "connected accounts" section, where they can associated and disassociate connected accounts.

If enabled, users cannot login through a username/password combination, but only through connected account providers. This will effectively lock out users that do not have a connected account provider set up, so use with caution. This will disable the password change functionality for any non-administrator.
If enabled, conventional registration will be disabled, and users can only register via one of the provided OAuth providers.

If enabled, additional data will be synchronized to custom user fields. Rules must be provided in the format 
provider_key=custom_user_field_id
or 
provider_id;provider_key=custom_user_field_id
. One rule per line.

If provided, users will be redirected to this page after logout instead. You can use {url} as token, which will be replaced with the page they were currently on while logging out. This option requires force OAuth login and redirect on single provider to be enabled.

If enabled, the user will automatically be redirected to the OAuth service upon opening a registration/login form for methods that have "Force OAuth" enabled, if there is only a single provider to chose from.
If enabled, email will be updated on login based on the connected account providers provided details. This will disable the email change functionality from the user account area.
If enabled, username will be updated on login based on the connected account providers provided details.
If enabled, shows a profile tab listing all donations made by the user.
Only applies if "Require captcha" is enabled
This allows users with the appropriate permissions to override the above settings for collapsed sidebar and collapsed side navigation from their preferences page.
Select how you would like user style changes (e.g. collapsed sidebar) to be remembered. User session data is deleted after a user has been inactive for 4 hours.

This value can be changed to avoid compatibility issues with other add-ons or enable similar criteria set by an existing add-on to be maintained. It is not recommended to change this value as it may break previously set criteria.
Heksadesimaaliset värit ilman etumerkkiä # ja vain nimettyjä värejä. Värialueita tuetaan. Kirjoita yksi kohta riviä kohti.
Members with last activity greater than X days will not have their birthdays shown.

If you decide to Force terms and rules agreement then the routes listed here will bypass being redirected to the force agreement page. The route path is the section of the URL to a page after your main forum directory URL, such as forums/ or pages/page-name/. Do not reference a route filter here.
Tämä linkki näkyy alatunnisteessa, ja käyttäjien on hyväksyttävä ehdot ja säännöt rekisteröinnin aikana.

This setting is for advanced users. If you installed the Tapatalk plug-in into a custom folder by manually changing the name of the default "mobiquo" folder, you must specify the custom folder name here. You will also need to specify the custom folder name in your Tapatalk forum owner account as well.

Tämä kenttä on pakollinen. Tapatalk API -avain antaa meille mahdollisuuden tarkistaa palvelimelta tulevien push-ilmoituspyyntöjen alkuperä. Anna foorumin omistajatilillesi annettu avain. Tämän näppäimen syöttäminen varmistaa, että työntöilmoitukset, kuten yksityisviestit ja tilaustoiminnot, voidaan toimittaa jäsenten mobiililaitteisiin.
Kuinka monta minuuttia jäsen voi muokata luokituksiaan.
Foorumit, joilla kauppiaiden linkit näkyvät viestiketjunäkymässä.
Sisällytä tuki monitavuisille merkeille. Käytetään yleensä vain kiinan, japanin ja venäjän kielissä.

The trending content half-life determines the point at which logged activity counts for half as much as it would today.
The trending content weights determine how much each metric counts towards the total score.

Enabling the Tweet button will allow your visitors to share pages easily using their Twitter account.

The number of days to keep the sidebar collapsed for. After this number of days the sidebar will be re-opened for the user. Set to 0 for indefinite.

For a custom welcome block, clear this field and edit template "uix_welcomeBlock_custom".
Shows a welcome section on all pages, not just the forum index.
Caches the unread post count for the specified time. 0 disables the cache.

Some email clients support reading a List-Unsubscribe header within emails which enables them to display a prominent option to allow a user to unsubscribe from mailing lists. The mechanism for notifying you about a user's request to unsubscribe is an email sent to the address specified here.

Note: Unless you enable "Automated unsubscribe email handler" below, it will be entirely your responsibility to manually check and process such emails, unless you are using a third party service that will do it for you. A value is required here if you enable the automated option.

Controls whether a List-Unsubscribe header is included in outgoing email which enables supporting clients to display a prominent option to allow a user to unsubscribe from emails. By default we recommend the HTTP option. If you select the email checkbox here, an email address must be provided in the "Unsubscribe email address" option below which will receive unsubscribe requests to be processed.

Note: If you choose the email option, it will be your responsibility to monitor the mailbox and manually process unsubscribe requests unless you enable the "Automated unsubscribe email handler" option below.
Turn on this option if you want to check for add-on updates from https://xfrocks.com/api/index.php?updater regularly. If you want to perform update check immediately, click here.
When checking for upgrades, by default, we will only look for stable upgrades. Uncheck this box to include "Unsupported" upgrades too.
If an internal URL is inserted into a post it can be automatically converted to an embedded rich preview.

Jos tämä on käytössä, jos URL-osoitetta käytetään viestin sisällä eikä kirjoittaja ole antanut otsikkoa, linkitetyn sivun otsikko haetaan ja käytetään sen sijaan.

Käytä yllä olevaa tekstikenttää määrittääksesi muodon. {title} korvataan haetulla sivun otsikolla ja {url} korvataan alkuperäisellä URL-osoitteella. Jos muotoa ei syötetä, otsikko itse tulee näkyviin.
If a URL is inserted into a post it can automatically be "unfurled" to display a rich preview of the link contents, such as title, description and image.
If you enable this option, the links generated by the system will not include "index.php?". However, to enable this, mod_rewrite must be available and an appropriate .htaccess file must be in place.
The @ character is used to initiate user mentions. If this option is disabled, successful user mentions will remove this character.
The user title ladder will use this field to determine how people move up the ladder.

When a username is changed, the change will be indicated on the user's profile and the previous username will be visible until the change is no longer "recent" based on this option. Note that moderators will be able to see full username change histories. Users will be able to see their own full username change history. Set this to 0 to disable displaying username changes publicly.
If enabled, the user will be required to provide a reason when requesting a username change.
Users will need to wait this number of days between username changes. If this is set to 0 users can change their username as frequently as they like.
This controls the minimum and maximum length of usernames. Use 0 to disable a limit.
This controls how long a user must wait before they are able to pick a username that was recently used by another user. Set this to 0 to disable this feature.
These options affect how views are counted for content, such as threads. They do not affect how views are counted for page nodes, attachments, or proxied images.
If enabled, watched content alerts and emails will only be sent to users that have visited within the specified number of days. This can improve performance on large or very active installations.
On supported devices, this button will open the browser's web share prompt, allowing users to share the current page to other applications.
Announcement which will be displayed at the top of the email. Leave empty to not display an announcement. HTML is allowed.
Exclude forums which are not open to all members. Additionally exclude forums which you don't want to include in the Weekly newsletter.
Add optional image URL here. Allows adding a logo or other image to the top of the email.
The last activity days prevents emails being sent to members who have not logged in for a long time.
Email topics are limited to this number.
By default threads are sorted by most viewed only. To additionally sort by forum title, select this option.
To send a test email, enter username and click Save. Go to Cron entries and run the Weekly newsletter cron manually. Leave blank to disable this function.
If a user clicks this button WhatsApp will open a list of users with whom to share the current page URL and title.

Olemme {board_title} ("me", "meidän", "meitä"). Olemme sitoutuneet suojelemaan ja kunnioittamaan yksityisyyttäsi. Jos sinulla on kysyttävää henkilökohtaisista tiedoistasi, ota yhteyttä.

Mitä tietoja meillä on sinusta

Tyyppisiä tietoja, joita keräämme ja käsittelemme, ovat:

  • Nimesi tai käyttäjätunnuksesi.
  • Sähköpostiosoitteesi.
  • Ip-osoitteesi.

Myös muita tietoja saatetaan kerätä, jos päätät jakaa niitä, esimerkiksi jos täytät profiilisi kenttiä.

Keräämme joitakin tai kaikkia näitä tietoja seuraavissa tapauksissa:

  • Rekisteröidyt jäseneksi tälle sivustolle.
  • Täytät yhteydenottolomakkeemme.
  • Selailet tätä sivustoa. Katso "Evästekäytäntö" alla.
  • Täytät kenttiä profiilissasi.

Miten henkilökohtaisia tietojasi käytetään

Mahdollisesti käytämme henkilökohtaisia tietojasi seuraavilla tavoilla:

  • Tehdäksemme sinusta sivustomme rekisteröityneen jäsenen, jotta voit osallistua sivuston sisällön tuottamiseen.
  • Mahdollisesti käytämme sähköpostiosoitettasi ilmoittaaksemme sinulle sivustollamme tapahtuvasta toiminnasta.
  • Ip-osoitteesi tallentuu, kun suoritat tiettyjä toimintoja sivustollamme. IP-osoitteesi ei ole koskaan julkisesti näkyvissä.

Muita tapoja, joilla voimme käyttää henkilötietojasi.

Sen lisäksi, että ilmoitamme sinulle sivustollamme tapahtuvasta toiminnasta, joka voi olla sinulle merkityksellistä, saatamme ajoittain haluta välittää kaikille jäsenille tärkeitä tietoja, kuten uutiskirjeitä tai ilmoituksia, sähköpostitse. Voit valita tällaisten sähköpostiviestien vastaanottamisen tai kieltämisen omassa profiilissasi.

Voi olla, että keräämme sinusta muita kuin henkilökohtaisesti tunnistettavia tietoja, kun olet vuorovaikutuksessa sivustomme kanssa. Nämä tiedot voivat sisältää teknisiä tietoja käyttämästäsi selaimesta tai laitetyypistä. Näitä tietoja käytetään ainoastaan analytiikkaan ja sivustomme kävijämäärien seurantaan.

Tietojesi suojaaminen

Olemme sitoutuneet varmistamaan, että kaikki meille antamasi tiedot ovat turvallisia. Luvattoman pääsyn tai paljastamisen estämiseksi olemme ottaneet käyttöön asianmukaiset toimenpiteet ja menettelyt keräämiemme tietojen suojaamiseksi ja turvaamiseksi.

Evästeet

Evästeet ovat pieniä tekstitiedostoja, jotka asetamme tietokoneellesi ja joiden avulla voimme tarjota tiettyjä toimintoja sivustollamme, kuten mahdollisuuden kirjautua sisään tai muistaa tietyt asetukset.

Meillä on yksityiskohtainen evästekäytäntö ja lisätietoja asettamistamme evästeistä tällä sivulla.

Oikeudet

Sinulla on oikeus tutustua sinusta hallussamme oleviin henkilötietoihin tai saada niistä kopio. Voit tehdä niin Ota yhteyttä. Jos uskot, että hallussamme olevat tiedot sinusta ovat puutteellisia tai virheellisiä, voit ottaa meihin yhteyttä ja pyytää meitä täydentämään tai korjaamaan tiedot.

Sinulla on myös oikeus pyytää henkilötietojesi poistamista. Ota yhteyttä, jos haluat, että poistamme henkilötietosi.

Tämän käytännön hyväksyminen

Sivustomme jatkuva käyttö merkitsee, että hyväksyt tämän käytännön. Jos et hyväksy tätä käytäntöä, älä käytä tätä sivustoa. Rekisteröitymisen yhteydessä pyydämme sinua lisäksi hyväksymään nimenomaisesti tietosuojakäytännön.

Muutokset tähän käytäntöön

An R2 bucket is where your data will reside on Cloudflare's servers. Bucket names cannot be changed, so it's a good idea to think about a naming convention that makes sense for you. A good rule of thumb is to include the site it belongs to as well as what kind of data the bucket will contain.

Tends to mutate state. Includes ListBuckets, PutBucket, ListObjects, PutObject, CopyObject, CompleteMultipartUpload, CreateMultipartUpload, ListMultipartUploads, UploadPart, UploadPartCopy and PutBucketEncryption.
Tends to read state. Includes HeadBucket, HeadObject, GetObject, UsageSummary, GetBucketEncryption and GetBucketLocation.
While this process has been tested, you agree that this is done entirely at your own risk. It's a good idea to have at least a basic understanding of R2.

Used to display short dates greater than 24 hours but less than 30 days ago. The number of days is available in the {days} placeholder. For example, {days}d would display 21d for a date occurring 21 days ago.

Used to display short dates greater than 60 minutes but less than 24 hours ago. The number of hours is available in the {hours} placeholder. For example, {hours}h would display 18h for a date occurring 18 hours ago.
Used to display short dates less than 60 minutes ago. The number of minutes is available in the {minutes} placeholder. For example, {minutes}m would display 45m for a date occurring 45 minutes ago.

This option allows you to display the ad only if the current page is the last page in a thread or a conversation.

This option can only be used with dynamic positions. Depending on the position used, ID can be a page result item number relative to the total results on the page, a node ID, a thread ID, or a flag: R, L, U, Xnumber.

Flags:

  • R - Random
  • L - Last
  • U - First unread thread post or conversation message
  • Xnumber - Every x items (x3, x5, etc)

You can combine the U flag with other flags and numbers. The U flag will have priority over the others.
You can use multiple IDs separated by comma.

Roskapostia. Jos tämä on tehty virheellisesti, ota yhteyttä järjestelmänvalvojaan.
The spam cleaner cannot be run at the moment. The selected forum to move spam threads to does not exist.
It is not possible to use the spam cleaner against administrators or moderators.
Et voi käyttää roskapostinpuhdistinta käyttäjiä vastaan, jotka ovat saaneet korkeamman reaktion pistemäärän kuin {reaction_score}.
You may not use the spam cleaner against users who have been registered for longer than {register_days} days.
You may not use the spam cleaner against users with more than {message_count} messages.
Rekisteröitymisesi on hylätty, koska se muistuttaa roskapostin kaltaista tai automatisoitua käytöstä. Ota yhteyttä ylläpitäjään saadaksesi lisätietoja tai apua.
The specified IP address match already exists.
The specified member cannot be found. Please enter a member's entire name.
The specified table already exists. Please choose another name.
The specified thread does not have a poll attached to it.
Antamaasi osoitetta ei voi liittää viestiin suoraan: liitä se pelkkänä linkkinä.
The specified user is already an administrator.
A 'src' attribute must not be specified when using 'dev' or 'prod' attributes.
Henkilökunnan jäseniä, ei voida kieltää vastaamasta.
Staff Activity results are determined by the date range selected here.
Restricts Staff Activity results to one member. Leave blank to show all staff.
Start sending summary email when user has been inactive for
You do not have permission to view steam statistics.
Kiinnitetyt viestiketjut näkyvät viestiketjujen luettelon ensimmäisen sivun yläreunassa niiden ylimmällä osioilla.
Stop notification emails from all categories
Stop notification emails from all threads
Stop notification emails from direct messages
Stop sending summary email when user has been inactive for
Check new registrations against the StopForumSpam database.

StopForumSpam testaa rekisteröityviltä käyttäjiltä kerätyt tiedot ja yrittää selvittää, ovatko he tunnettuja roskapostittajia. Jokainen varoituksen lippu, jonka käyttäjä luo, lasketaan. Liput sisältävät käyttäjänimen, sähköpostin ja IP-osoitteen.
You may choose to only count hits against the spam database that have previously been reported a certain number of times.
Only count flags recorded at least this many times
If selected, the user's email address will be converted to an MD5 hash before submission. This reduces the number of checks which are possible, including blacklist checks.
In order to avoid false positives, you may opt to only count hits against the spam database that have been previously recorded within a limited time period.
Laske vain X aikana tallennetut liput
Moderate registrations when this many warning flags are detected
Specify the number of warning flags (1-3) that are required for a registration to be placed in the moderation queue rather than accepted automatically.
Reject registrations when this many warning flags are detected

Specify the number of warning flags (1-3) that are required for a registration to be automatically rejected. This number should be equal to or greater than the value for the moderation threshold above.
Submit spammer information to StopForumSpam using API key

If you have an API key from StopForumSpam, you may have spammer activity on your site automatically reported back to StopForumSpam in order to improve the database for other users. This option will cause users who are banned via the spam cleaner to be reported.
The stored account provider does not match this request. Please try again.
A custom Stripe statement descriptor is required. A valid descriptor cannot be derived from your board title.

Enter the live secret and publishable keys from your Stripe Dashboard.

You will also need to set up a webhook endpoint in your Stripe account with the following URL: {boardUrl}/payment_callback.php?_xfProvider=stripe
Click the button above to pay faster using your saved payment details.

Statement descriptors explain charges or payments on bank statements. Leaving this empty will use the board title. If you wish to set a custom descriptor, it must follow the format outlined in Stripe's documentation.

The test keys will only be used if enableLivePayments is set to false in config.php.

Note: Before accepting live payments, you must activate your Stripe account from the Stripe Dashboard.
To verify incoming webhook signatures and prevent replay attacks you must provide the "Signing secret" from your Stripe dashboard under the API > Webhooks section.

Note: You must set up a webhook endpoint so that Stripe can send messages in order to verify and process payments. You can do this on the Developers > Webhooks page in your dashboard with the following URL: 
{boardUrl}/payment_callback.php?_xfProvider=stripe
For additional security, it is also recommended to input your "Signing secret" below.
It is strongly recommended that you backup your database and files before proceeding. This is not done automatically.
Style archives may only contain files with the following extensions: {extensions}.
This style contains no customized templates or style properties.
Tyylien tilan tunnusten on oltava uniikkeja. Määritetty tunnus on jo käytössä.

All animations within the system base their speed on this value. Smaller values (in seconds) make for faster animations
The basic background of all avatars, graphical and generic
Controls the size of the rounded corners on avatars - a sufficiently large value will make avatars circular
The image URL specified here will be used as the image within the default avatar. Only applies if the "Image" type is selected above.
The character(s) specified here will be used as the text within the default avatar. Only applies if the "Text" type is selected above.
Controls whether the default avatar is text or image based. Unless disabled in the options, default avatars will be dynamically generated based on the user's name.
For letter-based avatars, this is the font employed for the text
Use this to help vertically center a dynamic avatar character when changing the font. This will be scaled based on the font size percentage.
Using a value between 0 and 100, this represents the approximate height of a dynamic avatar text character as a percentage of avatar.
Badges appear to indicate a number if items requiring attention, such as unread messages in your inbox
Highlighted badges grab the viewer's attention more and tend to indicate new items to be reviewed
All BB code blocks within messages make use of these styling rules
When a large quote is posted in a message, it will expand to this height before a scrollbar appears
Styles the title section of BB code blocks within messages
This margin is used for the image side facing any wrapped text, and the bottom of the image
Enter a maximum width in pixels for BB code images defined as 'large'
Special styling rules for inline code ([ICODE]) elements.
Virtually all blocks have their borders styled with these settings
Controls the size of the curve on block border corners
When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here
When information needs to be conveyed in a footer element for a block, its style is controlled here
Blocks often have title bars at their tops, which are styled here
Some links are displayed as small blocks such as choices in a popup menu, and their background will highlight when hovered
Styling for block-type links when in their selected state
Sub-headings in blocks use these settings
The horizontal space between the edges of a block and its content
The vertical space between a block's content and its edges
Occasionally, blocks will have multi-part, tab headers, styled with these settings
The selected tab in multi-part headers takes additional styling from here
Text headers are used for subtle identification of content areas, without changing the background style or color
Structural borders around blocks of content generally use this color
Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons
Call to action buttons sit alone and invite the user to do something, like post a new thread
Most buttons use this styling, except for primary form submit buttons
When buttons are disabled and unclickable, they use these styling rules
These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms
To change icon check here.
The primary use for chips is in tagging content, where each tag will appear as a chip
Chip styling is adjusted using these settings when they are hovered
When attention needs to be directed to content, this background may be employed
This background color is used for further differentiation from regular content
Links within accented content will be styled with these settings
When an alternative background needs to be presented along side the main content background, this will be employed
In order to differentiate it, some content will be presented on this alternative background
This styling is applied to the background of primary content, such as messages
Most normal content will sit on this background
If an area of content is selected, for example a row in a table, its normal background will be substituted with this
When the standard background color is highlighted or selected, it will use this color

Data list rows each have this much vertical padding

Color for icons that are disabled or unavailable

Background for the toolbar when the editor is not focused
The background of the toolbar when the editor is focused

Defines the color used as a border within the email content area

Defines the logo URL to be used in emails. We do not recommend specifying SVG images here.
Defines the color of the body text of HTML emails
Defines how muted text will be displayed in emails. This may be used for minor text in the email body and for email footer text
This controls how the navigation is displayed in the Find threads section.
Occasionally, system messages will be displayed to the visitor in a fixed element that slides down from the top of the window. Its styling is controlled here
A message may temporarily appear at the top of the screen to indicate the result of an action taken. Its styling can be controlled here.
This font is used for the text of messages etc.
The font list used for mono-spaced text input and output
The font list for your main text
Additional information about form controls may sometimes be found immediately below the control being explained
Within the label column, some controls may require an additional hint to define their role
In full-width forms, the left column contains labels for the controls in the right column
This should be expressed as a percentage.
When the viewport width is below this value, the two-column layout will collapse into a single column version
This horizontal padding is applied to the touching edges of the label and controls columns
This padding is applied to the outer edges of the form content
Each form row has this padding above and below its content

At the bottom of most forms is a bar containing the submit button etc.

This is the base color of the gadgets that display when an action is being processed in the background.

Styling for the name of the user whose tooltip is being displayed if the user has uploaded a profile banner

Styling for link rows in menus, when selected or hovered

This value controls the padding around the message text when using the small message block

Chrome on Android allows the address bar color to be changed to fit your site colors. If you want this to be changed, enter a color here.
Content within blocks that is of less importance than the main content may be styled here
When the content within a node has been read, its icon will revert to a less attention-grabbing color, defined here
Node icons give an at-a-glance indication of whether or not the content housed within the node has been read. The unread icon color should stand out from its background for quick identification
To save vertical space, it is possible to hide node descriptions until the node title is hovered, at which point they are displayed in a tooltip
Choose the style in which sub-forums will be displayed within a particular node element, according to the amount of space you want them to occupy
Each scrollable notice will be displayed for this amount of time before the next is displayed. Hovering or interacting with the notices will prevent auto scrolling.
Overlays use a header element to identify their contents, styled here
When an overlay is displayed, the page content will be blurred by the amount specified here. This can help draw focus to the overlay content.
When an overlay is shown, the page behind is masked by the color defined here. Use RGBA transparency to allow the page to show through
This defines the distance between the top of the viewport and the top of the overlay
The page background, behind all block elements, uses the styling rules defined here
The background of the page itself, on which all other content rests
All elements will be spaced at least this far from the edges of the page
Used to style clickable page numbers
Styles the control that indicates the current page number

This controls the appearance of page navigation. "Simple" focuses on the current page and is good for touch devices. "Full" shows relative page numbers and is good for desktops. "Mixed" switches between them based on device size.
As the window is resized, it will continue to grow in width until this value, after which it will remain static
If enabled, the input for a profile post comment will only be displayed after the toggle is clicked.
The progress bar appears at the top of the window when the system is waiting for a response from the server
Path to the small logo that is associated with bookmarks pointing to your site
The footer is the primary element that sits below the main content on all public pages
Controls styling for individual links within the footer
The header row contains your logo and sits at the top of every public page
The color of the header background is adjusted to be used as the background for the inbox and alerts area in the header
The path to your icon image. This should be a 192x192 image and usually a PNG.
The path to your large icon image. This should be a 512x512 image and usually a PNG.
If enabled, you are indicating that the icons above respect the minimum safe zone and can be cropped to the appropriate icon size for various devices.
If you specify the height of your logo here, you can avoid a costly re-flow of your page layout once the logo loads.
The web path from your site's XenForo installation directory to your logo image.
The path to a double-resolution / retina version of your logo image
If you specify the width of your logo here, you can avoid a costly re-flow of your page layout once the logo loads.
Path to the metadata / OpenGraph logo used by your site on social media
The navigation row sits below the header and contains the primary site navigation tabs and menus
Below this page width, the navigation system will collapse down into an off canvas menu
Defines the amount of padding applied horizontally to each main navigational tab in the header
This value defines the amount of padding applied to the main navigational tabs in the header
Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when they are selected
If you intend for some or all of your header to stick to the top of the page when it is scrolled, choose which elements should stick
Controls the styling of individual tab elements within the navigation row
Additional styling to apply to navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them
Styling applied when the popup menu for the current tab is visible
If you provide the URL to a single color/alpha channel logo/icon here, this will be used in place of the browser's default icon.
The path to the video instructing iOS users how to install the PWA.
Visible only to staff, the staff tools bar sits above the header and contains items such as reported content, the moderation queue...
Below the main navigation row, this row shows content associated with the selected main navigation tab
Additional styling applied to sub-navigation tabs when the pointer hovers over them

If enabled, the top three reactions received will be displayed on the list pages (such as thread lists).
When the page is narrower than this value, the spacers at the edge of the page are discarded
Medium width styling rules are used below this page width value
The page is considered 'narrow' if its width is less than this value
The page will use the 'wide' styling rules if its width is below this value, and the 'full' rules if the width exceeds it

Certain elements have special floating tooltips, which are controlled here
This controls how the navigation is displayed in the What's new section. Side navigation works better with more sections but requires more space.
Controls the relative 'height' of elements in the Z-dimension (perpendicular to the screen). Unless you have a specific reason to change this, leave it alone...
Avatars are graphical representations of users. Some users may upload their own images, while others will use the default letter-based imagery. Styling for both of these types is controlled here.
Defines the location of various commonly-used assets etc.
This section contains properties and options relating to BB codes used to style messages and other user-generated content.

Most content within XenForo is presented within a structure of 'blocks', which wrap content in a collection of HTML boxes, allowing very flexible styling. Settings controlling those boxes are located here.
Settings controlling the thickness and color of structural borders, as well as global settings for element spacing and padding.
Various text-button types are in use within XenForo but all share common styling properties, which are located here.

These settings define the colors that will be used throughout the system for specific content or structure types. For consistency and ease of editing, the colors used should come primarily from the Color Palette.
The styling for content areas, namely those areas on which dynamic information is presented, is controlled here.
Data lists are used to display content organized into rows and columns (tabular content).
Basic settings for HTML email styling are included here.
Settings controlling the style and size of text within the system.
The lower elements of public-facing pages are controlled here, including the footer background and text styling.
Styling for form structural elements, such as form headers, label columns etc., as well as dimensions for elements within differing viewport sizes, are housed here.
The upper elements of public-facing pages are controlled with these settings, including navigation tabs and the header logo.
Inline moderation allows moderators to take actions against multiple pieces of content simultaneously. It may also be exposed to members via systems like conversations.
Individual form controls - primarily text boxes, are styled here, including focused and disabled variants.
Elements for the special page on which the full information for a user is displayed are styled here.
Most popup menus within the system share common styling attributes, which are located here.
The various elements that combine to form the main message block, including the message itself, the user info block and the signature, are controlled here.
Various settings that don't fit elsewhere are included here, including badges, chips and animation parameters.
Specific styling elements for the hierarchical list of forums, pages etc. are included here.
Common styling controls for the various overlays (windows of content that open over the top of the rest of the page) are found here.

Tämän verkkosivuston tarjoaman palvelun ("palvelu") tarjoajat ("me", "me", "meidän") eivät ole vastuussa mistään käyttäjän luomasta sisällöstä ja tileistä. Esitetty sisältö ilmaisee vain niiden kirjoittajan näkemykset.

Tämä palvelu on käytettävissä vain käyttäjille, jotka ovat vähintään {age} vuotta vanhoja. Jos olet tätä nuorempi, älä luo tiliä tähän palveluun. Jos rekisteröidyt tähän palveluun, vakuutat, että olet tämän ikäinen tai vanhempi.

Henkilöstön jäsenet voivat tarkistaa kaiken lähettämäsi, lataamasi tai muuten Palvelun käyttöön antaman sisällön ("Sisältö"). Kaikki lähettämäsi tai lähettämäsi sisältö voidaan lähettää kolmansien osapuolien varmennuspalveluihin (mukaan lukien, mutta rajoittumatta, roskapostin estämispalvelut). Älä lähetä mitään sisältöä, jota pidät yksityisenä tai luottamuksellisena.

Hyväksyt etkä käytä Palvelua lähettämään tai linkittämään sisältöä, joka on loukkaavaa, väärinkäyttävää, uhkaavaa, uhkaavaa, roskapostia tai roskapostin kaltaista, loukkaavaa, sisältää aikuisille tarkoitettua tai kielteistä sisältöä, sisältää muiden henkilökohtaisia tietoja, riskejä tekijänoikeusrikkomus, rohkaisee laittomaan toimintaan tai rikkoo muuten lakeja. Olet täysin vastuussa sisällöstä ja siitä aiheutuvista vahingoista tai käyttäytymisestäsi.

Voimme poistaa tai muokata mitä tahansa toimitettua sisältöä milloin tahansa, ilman syytä tai ilman ilmoitusta. Pyynnöt sisällön poistamiseksi tai muuttamiseksi tehdään vain oman harkintamme mukaan. Voimme lopettaa pääsyn palveluun tai sen osaan milloin tahansa, syystä tai ilman syytä, ilmoituksella tai ilman ilmoitusta.

Voit antaa meille yksinoikeuden, pysyvän, peruuttamattoman, rajoittamattoman käyttöoikeuden sisällön käyttämiseen, julkaisemiseen tai uudelleen julkaisemiseen Palvelun yhteydessä. Sinulla on sisällön tekijänoikeudet.

Näitä ehtoja voidaan muuttaa milloin tahansa ilman erillistä ilmoitusta.

Jos et hyväksy näitä ehtoja, älä rekisteröi tai käytä Palvelua. Palvelun käyttö tarkoittaa näiden ehtojen hyväksymistä. Jos haluat sulkea tilisi, ota meihin yhteyttä.
Testi epäonnistui, kun muodostettiin yhteys palveluntarjoajaan. Palveluntarjoajan avainta ei voi noutaa.

Varakoodia voidaan käyttää, kun sinulla ei ole pääsyä muuhun vaihtoehtoiseen varmennusmenetelmään. Kun varakoodia käytetään, sitä ei enää voida käyttää uudelleen. Saat sähköpostia, kun kirjaudut sisään varakoodilla.
If you use the Authy app on your device, you can utilise their OneTouch feature to authenticate requests with a simple tap/click.
Näitä koodeja voidaan käyttää sisäänkirjautumiseen, jos sinulla ei ole pääsyä muihin vahvistusmenetelmiin. Pidä nämä koodit erittäin turvallisessa paikassa.
Tämä lähettää koodin sähköpostitse kirjautumisesi vahvistamiseksi. Muut kaksivaiheiset vahvistusmenetelmät olisi valittava tämän sijasta, jos mahdollista.
This allows you to use hardware keys or biometric verification if your device supports it.
Tämän avulla voit luoda vahvistuskoodin puhelimessa olevalla sovelluksella.

Enhanced search uses an Elasticsearch server to provide improved search functionality within XenForo. This includes relevancy sorting, searches for shorter words, support for stemming and customizable stop words, and improved performance.

Enhanced search requires Elasticsearch 2.0 or newer. Elasticsearch is a separate service which must be installed separately from your web server, PHP, and MySQL. Installation of Elasticsearch requires you to have root access to your server. Please speak to your server administrator for questions regarding Elasticsearch installation.

Jos tämä asetus on käytössä, hakutulosten relevanssialgoritmi painottaa uudempia tuloksia puoliintumisajan perusteella. Tänään lähetetty asiakirja on kaksi kertaa niin relevantti kuin identtinen asiakirja, joka on lähetetty puoliintumisajan sitten.

If enabled, before indexing, accents will be removed and other complex character representations converted to simpler ones. This can improve search results by allowing multiple accent variations (esta, está) of a word to match. However, it can also make words match unexpectedly when they differ only by accents.

This allows similar thread results in the same forum as the original thread to be considered more relevant. Their relevancy score will be multiplied by the value entered here. Use 1 to disable this boosting.
